item.title: Cath add a quote by Michael Palin
item.description: "You can't get a suit of armour and a rubber chicken just like that. You have to plan ahead." -- Michael Palin

item.title: Cath add a quote by Paul Theroux
item.description: "Tourists don't know where they've been, travelers don't know where they're going." -- Paul Theroux

item.title: Cath add a quote by Nigel Slater
item.description: "It is impossible not to love someone who makes toast for you. " -- Nigel Slater

item.title: Cath add a quote by Wilkie Collins
item.description: "My hour for tea is half-past five, and my buttered toast waits for nobody." -- Wilkie Collins

item.title: Cath add a quote by Dorothy L. Sayers
item.description: "Nothing goes so well with a hot fire and buttered crumpets as a wet day without and a good dose of comfortable horrors within. The heavier the lashing of the rain and the ghastlier the details, the better the flavour seems to be." -- Dorothy L. Sayers

item.title: Cath add a quote by Dorothy L. Sayers
item.description:
"Do you find it easy to get drunk on words?"
"So easy that, to tell you the truth, I am seldom perfectly sober." -- Dorothy L. Sayers

item.title: Cath add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "It's not worth doing something unless someone, somewhere, would much rather you weren't doing it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Cath add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "DON'T THINK OF IT AS DYING, said Death. JUST THINK OF IT AS LEAVING EARLY TO AVOID THE RUSH." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Cath add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "I'll be more enthusiastic about encouraging thinking outside the box when there's evidence of any thinking going on inside it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Cath add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "Kindred spirits are not so scarce as I used to think. It's splendid to find out there are so many of them in the world." -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Cath add a quote by Anthony Powell
item.description: "I get a warm feeling among my books." -- Anthony Powell

item.title: Cath add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "Any planet is 'Earth' to those that live on it." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Cath add a quote by Umberto Eco
item.description: "We live for books." -- Umberto Eco

item.title: Cath add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?" -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Cath add a quote by Ellen DeGeneres
item.description: "Accept who you are. Unless you're a serial killer." -- Ellen DeGeneres

item.title: Cath add a quote by Mary Leakey
item.description: "Basically, I have been compelled by curiosity." -- Mary Leakey

item.title: Cath add a quote by Kate Chopin
item.description: "The voice of the sea speaks to the soul." -- Kate Chopin

item.title: Cath add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Cath add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Poets have been mysteriously silent on the subject of cheese." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Cath add a quote by Kate Greenaway
item.description: "Living in that childish wonder is a most beautiful feeling - I can so well remember it. There was always something more - behind and beyond everything - to me, the golden spectacles were very, very big." -- Kate Greenaway

item.title: Cath add a quote by Elizabeth von Arnim
item.description: "What a blessing it is to love books." -- Elizabeth von Arnim

item.title: Cath add a quote by George Mac Donald
item.description: "Work is not always required. There is such a thing as sacred idleness." -- George Mac Donald

item.title: Cath add a quote by John Cheever
item.description: "I've been homesick for countries I've never been, and longed to be where I couldn't be." -- John Cheever

item.title: Cath add a quote by Erin McKean
item.description: "You don’t owe prettiness to anyone. Not to your boyfriend/spouse/partner, not to your co-workers, especially not to random men on the street. You don’t owe it to your mother, you don’t owe it to your children, you don’t owe it to civilization in general. Prettiness is not a rent you pay for occupying a space marked ‘female’." -- Erin McKean

item.title: Cath add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "You know, Hobbes, some days even my lucky rocket ship underpants don't help." -- Bill Watterson
